headline: Stock Market Today: Dow Dives, Cybersecurity Plays Hit As Software Sinks; Gold Stocks Shine (Live Coverage)
summary: Indexes, including the Dow Jones industrials, dived on the stock market today. The EU made a Trump tariff move. Novo stock slid but gold plays shined.

headline: Verizon Weighs Frontier Deal Synergies Cost Cuts And Customer Policy Shifts
summary: Verizon Communications (NYSE:VZ) has completed its acquisition of Frontier, expanding its fiber network footprint. The company is targeting over US$1b in operating cost synergies by 2028, alongside broader cost saving efforts. Verizon is pursuing an operational turnaround that includes workforce reductions aimed at US$5b in annual cost savings. The carrier is revising its device unlock policy after customer backlash, affecting how quickly phones can be used on other networks. For you as an...
